titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments to certain Senate committees for the 109th Congress.
A resolution making minority party appointments to certain Senate committees for the 109th Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Makes minority party appointments to the following Senate Committees for the 109th Congress: (1) Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs; (2) Energy and Natural Resources; (3) Aging; (4) Budget; (5) Ethics; and (6) Intelligence.
